errors.error_description: Installing pip dependencies before creating and activating the virtual environment
correction_candidates: Replace the entire block with 'python -m venv env && source env/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements_debug.txt'
Add 'python -m pip install --upgrade pip' before 'pip install -r requirements_debug.txt'
Change 'pip install -r requirements_debug.txt' to 'pip3 install -r requirements_debug.txt'
